summary: Implements a modular block for hybrid Vision Transformer architectures, encapsulating token mixing and feed‑forward operations. The class sets up the necessary sub‑layers during initialization and provides a forward computation that processes input tensors through these components.
business_intent: Provide a reusable building block that combines convolutional and transformer‑style processing to simplify the creation of efficient hybrid vision models for image recognition and related computer‑vision tasks.
